abstract: United Nations Children's Fund reports that while underdeveloped countries have shown overall improvement in conditions for children, statistics are averages and hide fact that world's poorest children are worse off than ever.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations Children’s Fund said improvements in national averages had obscured worsening trends among the world’s poorest children.

headline.main: Unicef Report Describes Grim Trends for the Poorest Children
headline.print_headline: Unicef Report Describes Grim Trends for the Poorest

snippet: The United Nations Children’s Fund said improvements in national averages had obscured worsening trends among the world’s poorest children.
